subject: Soccer
Domestic Violence
organizations: United States Women's National Soccer Team
lead_paragraph: Hope Solo, the star goalie of the United States national women’s team, has been allowed to play and wore the captain’s armband despite accusations she punched her sister and nephew.
snippet: Hope Solo, the star goalie of the United States national women’s team, has been allowed to play and wore the captain’s armband despite accusations she punched her sister and nephew.
